sourcing.instructions: - Arsenic: Obtain from a chemical supply company or online chemistry store with proper safety protocols.
steps: - Arsenic: Obtain from a chemical supply company or online chemistry store with proper safety protocols.
1. In a well-ventilated area, wear appropriate personal protective equipment (gloves, goggles, mask).

steps: 1. After the heating duration is complete, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool gradually to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration is complete, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool gradually to room temperature.

steps: 1. If necessary, sand the surface of the solid sample to achieve a smooth finish using fine-grit sandpaper.
